about.title: Our Story
about.body: Founded in 2012 by former professional athlete Marcus Johnson, FitLife Gym has grown into the premier fitness destination in our community. Our mission is to provide world-class facilities and expert guidance to help every member achieve their fitness goals.
about.subtitle: Why choose FitLife Gym

owner.name: Marcus Johnson
owner.title: Owner & Head Trainer
owner.bio: Former NFL linebacker with 10+ years of professional training experience. Marcus specializes in strength training and athletic performance, helping clients achieve peak physical condition.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about FitLife Gym

items.question: Can I try before I join?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a free 3-day trial with full access to the gym, classes, and amenities. No credit card required to start your trial.

items.question: What's included in membership?
items.answer: All plans include 24/7 gym access, cardio and weight equipment, locker rooms, and parking. Premium and Elite add unlimited classes, sauna, and more perks.

items.question: Are personal trainers included?
items.answer: Personal training is available as an add-on for Basic and Premium members. Elite members get 2 sessions per month included in their membership.

items.question: Do you have group classes?
items.answer: Yes! We offer 40+ classes per week including HIIT, yoga, CrossFit, spin, and more. Premium and Elite members have unlimited class access.

items.question: What are your hours?
items.answer: Our facility is open Monday-Friday 5 AM-11 PM, Saturday 6 AM-10 PM, and Sunday 7 AM-9 PM. Premium and Elite members have 24/7 keycard access.

items.question: Can I bring a guest?
items.answer: Premium and Elite members can bring guests. Basic members can purchase guest passes for $10 per visit.

items.question: What if I need to cancel?
items.answer: Memberships are month-to-month with no long-term contracts. Cancel anytime with 30 days notice. We also offer freeze options for vacations or injuries.

items.question: Do you offer nutrition guidance?
items.answer: Yes! Premium members get one free nutrition consultation. We also offer custom meal plans and ongoing coaching for an additional fee.

items.question: Is there parking?
items.answer: Yes, we have a large free parking lot with ample spaces, including electric vehicle charging stations.

items.question: Are showers and lockers available?
items.answer: Yes! We have clean, spacious locker rooms with showers, changing areas, and complimentary towels (Elite members only for towels).
